授業目的: The purpose of this class is to learn the basic theories of "Economics of Entrepreneurship" based on the literature published in refereed journals in this field.
到達目標: The ultimate goal is to write a paper publishable in refereed journals.
授業方法: Based on the presentations by participants, we will review the literature and discuss a research gap in the literature and a research direction for master thesis.

トピック.授業計画1: Based on the presentations by participants, we will review the literature (3 papers per week) and discuss a research agenda for master thesis.
トピック.授業外学習2: Read a number of papers published in refereed journals, such as Entrepreneurship Theory and Practice, Industrial and Corporate Change, Journal of Business Venturing, Journal of Small Business Management, Research Policy, and Small Business Economics. Then, find a research gap in the literature and a research direction for Ph.D. thesis.

教科書/Required texts1: David J Storey and Francis Greene
評価.学生による授業評価の方法Course Evaluation by Student: Course evaluation will be conducted based on the regulation of the university.
成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【600】研究演習　８／Seminar
